name: Rocket Companies, Inc.
description: Rocket Companies, Inc. is a leading technology-driven real estate and mortgage company based in the United States. Founded in 1985 as Rock Financial, the company has transformed into a prominent player in the mortgage industry, primarily through its flagship brand, Quicken Loans. Rocket Companies specializes in providing a seamless digital mortgage experience, leveraging advanced technology to streamline the home loan process from application to closing. The company offers a diverse range of mortgage products, including conventional loans, FHA loans, VA loans, and refinancing options, catering to a broad spectrum of consumers. In addition to its mortgage services, Rocket Companies operates various subsidiaries that focus on real estate, title insurance, and other financial services, creating a comprehensive ecosystem to support home buyers and homeowners. With a strong emphasis on customer service, Rocket Companies has consistently ranked as one of the highest-rated mortgage lenders in the nation, committed to simplifying the home financing experience while ensuring transparency and efficiency. The company’s mission is to empower individuals to achieve their homeownership dreams through innovative technology and exceptional service, making home buying accessible and straightforward for everyone.

seo.meta_title: Rocket Companies, Inc. | Leading Digital Mortgage Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Rocket Companies, Inc., a technology-driven leader in the mortgage and real estate industry. Discover how Rocket is simplifying home financing.

faq.question: What services does Rocket Companies provide?
faq.answer: Rocket Companies provides mortgage services, including conventional, FHA, and VA loans, as well as real estate services like title insurance.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Rocket Companies?
faq.answer: Jay Farner is the CEO of Rocket Companies, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Rocket Companies headquartered?
faq.answer: Rocket Companies is headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, USA.

faq.question: What are Rocket Companies' main products?
faq.answer: Rocket Companies' main products include various mortgage options and real estate services.
